is below 2 months. Refer to health facility. Have you referred them for danger signs management?

bind.relevant: selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_sleepy , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_less_active , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_yellow , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_hot_cold , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_bleeding , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_vomit , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_chest , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_drink , 'no') and selected( /child_assessment/danger_signs_screening/danger_signs_breath , 'no') and not(selected( /child_assessment/malaria/malaria_fever_length , '7')) and not(selected( /child_assessment/malaria/malaria_fever_length , '14'))
